[Created for iambeowulf ]

A first-Person POV story! A young man finds himself mysteriously shrunk and sent Quantum Leap-style through various Disney worlds. On his journey to get back home, he’ll encounter various giant-sized (to him) female Disney characters from movies like Frozen, Brave, Tangled, Aladdin, Alice in Wonderland, Snow White, Cinderella and more! However, his task won’t be easy, as in order to get back home, he’ll have to get each girl’s attention, even if it’s from the inside...

No male giants
No anthro/furry characters
